name: Roy Tang
text: I rewatched just the last few scenes on the rooftop; the only way Sherlock could've prepared anything as elaborate as street actors etc would be if he was able to predict everything Moriarty had planned up to and including the forced suicide and Moriarty's own actions on the rooftop. I want him to be clever, but not super deus ex machina clever. I'd prefer if it was something he made up on the spot right there on the rooftop lol. Well, we'll find out tomorrow
